summary: The Security Council, recalling its resolution 1774 (2007) and Article 15 of the Statute of the International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda, decides to reappoint Mr. Hassan Bubacar Jallow as Prosecutor of the International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda, notwithstanding the provisions of Article 15, paragraph 4, of the Statute, for a term from 15 September 2011 until 31 December 2014, subject to earlier termination upon completion of the Tribunal's work, in order to enable the Tribunal to complete its remaining work as called for in resolution 1966 (2010).
